# Hi, Welcome to my Github Profile!

I am a co-founder at Monadex Labs ðŸŸ£, where we are working towards building the ultimate web3 infrastructure on the upcoming Monad chain.

Besides, I am also a computer engineering student, a blockchain developer and a smart contract security researcher with a passion for decentralized finance. In my free time, I dabble at some UI design and full-stack development, which allows me to weave frictionless digital experiences for my DeFi products.


## My Tech Stack

I work with a ton of languages, frameworks, and tools as I hop from one domain to another, trying to tackle all parts of a product development cycle. This has especially helped me at Monadex Labs, where we being a relatively small team, need to take on multiple roles. Here's a splatter of some languages, frameworks and tools I have worked with,
